trans-unit.source: Provides a unified way of converting types of values to other types, as well as for accessing standard values and subproperties.
trans-unit.target: 提供的值的类型转换为其他类型，以及访问标准值和子属性的统一的方法。

trans-unit.source: The most common type of converter is one that converts to and from a text representation.
trans-unit.target: 最常见类型是转换器的指与文本表示形式之间来回进行转换。

trans-unit.source: The type converter for a class is bound to the class with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 类的类型转换器绑定到以<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>类

trans-unit.source: Unless this attribute is overridden, all classes that inherit from this class use the same type converter as the base class.
trans-unit.target: 除非被重写此特性，从此类继承的所有类作为基类都使用相同的类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For general type system purposes, do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 用于常规类型系统开销不访问的类型转换器直接。

trans-unit.source: Instead, access the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 相反，通过使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>访问相应的转换器

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code examples provided.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅提供的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: **Note** For XAML purposes, a XAML processor searches for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> directly, instead of going through <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**对于 XAML 用途，XAML 处理器将搜索<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>而经过<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>不是直接，</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For cases where you do want a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> instance from code, or where you create a shared instance in WPF resources, it is acceptable to construct it directly without referencing <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> or other reflection and type system support.
trans-unit.target: 在你希望的情况下<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>实例从代码中，或在 WPF 中创建的共享的实例其中资源，它是可接受的构造直接无需引用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>或其他反射和类型系统支持。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Classes derived from TypeConverter are often referenced as part of how a XAML processor converts an attribute or initialization text value from markup (which is inherently a string) and generates an object for a run-time representation.
trans-unit.target: 派生自 TypeConverter 类通常称为 XAML 处理器如何将属性或初始化文本值转换从标记 （它是本质上是一个字符串） 的一部分，并在生成的运行时表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: Custom type authors that intend to support a type conversion behavior for XAML typically implement a TypeConverter class that supports their own unique `ConvertFrom` behavior from a string.
trans-unit.target: 想通常针对的 XAML 支持类型转换行为的自定义类型作者实现支持其自己唯一的 TypeConverter 类`ConvertFrom`从字符串的行为。

trans-unit.source: This behavior enables type conversion from the string provided as a XAML attribute value and provides a XAML processor with the support needed to create an object from the string, so that the object can be produced in a parsed object graph.
trans-unit.target: 此行为使从提供为 XAML 特性值的字符串的类型转换，XAML 处理器提供所需从字符串中，创建一个对象，以便可以在分析的对象图中生成对象的支持。

trans-unit.source: Custom types or members of custom types are indicated by applying <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> to the definitions, with the attribute referencing the custom TypeConverter implementation.
trans-unit.target: 由自定义的类型或自定义类型的成员应用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>定义，且该特性引用的自定义的类型转换器实现。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Type Converters for XAML Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型转换器 XAML 概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For XAML purposes, you do not typically provide branching implementations based on `culture`.
trans-unit.target: 对于 XAML 用途，你不通常提供分支实现基于`culture`。

trans-unit.source: This is because XAML is precompiled in a development environment context, and culture-specific information for runtime XAML is not relevant for XAML type conversion.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 XAML 进行预编译后在开发环境上下文中，并且运行时的区域性特定信息 XAML 不适用于 XAML 类型转换。

trans-unit.source: The most common types to convert are to and from a string object.

trans-unit.source: This implementation calls <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> on the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is a string.

trans-unit.source: Custom type authors that intend to support a type conversion behavior for XAML typically implement a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> class that supports <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> behavior from a string.
trans-unit.target: 想通常针对的 XAML 支持类型转换行为的自定义类型作者实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>支持的类<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>从字符串的行为。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: These type converters might also implement ConvertTo to support serialization back to XAML.
trans-unit.target: 这些类型转换器也可能实现 ConvertTo 以支持回 XAML 序列化。

trans-unit.source: Some XAML serialization scenarios cannot be adequately addressed with <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> alone.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing a standard set of valid values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>包含一组标准的有效的值，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果数据类型不支持标准值集。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of standard values for the data type this type converter is designed for when provided with a format context.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于提供格式上下文适用于此类型转换器的数据类型的标准值集合。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>, this method always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>，此方法始终返回`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context that can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a standard set of valid values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>保存一组标准的有效的值，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果数据类型不支持标准值集。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the collection of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list.
trans-unit.target: 返回从返回的标准值的集合是否<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>为独占列表。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此类中实现时，此方法始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表是独占的如在枚举数据类型，则其他任何值不都无效。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not exclusive, then other valid values might exist in addition to the list of standard values that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method provides.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表不是独占的那么列表之外，还可能存在其他有效值标准值<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法提供。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the values are exclusive, the list returned by <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> should not allow these values to be edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些值是独占的返回的列表<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>不应允许编辑这些值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果从<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>，是可能的值; 的穷举列表<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果还可能有其他值。 </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection></xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the collection of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of possible values, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 返回从返回的标准值的集合是否<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>是可能的值，使用指定的上下文的独占列表。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此类中实现时，此方法始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表是独占的如在枚举数据类型，则其他任何值不都无效。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not exclusive, then other valid values might exist in addition to the list of standard values that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method provides.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表不是独占的那么列表之外，还可能存在其他有效值标准值<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法提供。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the values are exclusive, the list returned by <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> should not allow these values to be edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些值是独占的返回的列表<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>不应允许编辑这些值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，用于提供格式上下文。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果从<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>，是可能的值; 的穷举列表<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果还可能有其他值。 </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection></xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 返回此对象是否支持可以从列表中选取的值的标准集。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the given value object is valid for this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定的值的对象是否对此类型有效。

trans-unit.source: Starting in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A> method catches exceptions from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A>方法捕获异常从<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the input value type causes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> to return `false`, or if the input value causes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to raise an exception, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的值类型导致<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>返回`false`，或如果输入的值将导致<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>以引发异常，<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A>方法返回`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to test for validity.

trans-unit.source: Starting in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the IsValid method catches exceptions from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，IsValid 方法捕获异常从<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the input value type causes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> to return `false`, or if the input value causes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to raise an exception, the IsValid method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的值类型导致<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>返回`false`，或如果输入的值将导致<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>为了引发异常时，IsValid 方法会返回`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sorts a collection of properties.
trans-unit.target: 对进行排序属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: All properties in the collection that are not already in the array of names are added alphabetically to the end.
trans-unit.target: 集合中尚不的名称数组中的所有属性都按字母顺序都添加到末尾。

trans-unit.source: If the `names` parameter is an empty array or `null`, all the properties in the collection are sorted alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: 如果`names`参数是一个空数组或`null`，集合中的所有属性的字母顺序都排序。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that has the properties to sort.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>具有要排序的属性。

trans-unit.source: An array of names in the order you want the properties to appear in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在顺序中的名称的数组你想要在集合中显示的属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the sorted properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>包含已排序的属性。
